cohort_origin.desc: Stating the cohort contributing the representative gene

cohort_assembled.desc: Stating the metagenomic sequencing cohort(s) contributing the representaive gene or a redundant gene belonging to it

individual_occurence_frequency.desc: Occurrence frequency in individuals based on gene profile

kegg_functional_categories.desc: KEGG functional category(ies) of the annotated KO(s)

sample_occurence_frequency.desc: Occurrence frequency in samples based on gene profile

gene_completeness_status.desc: Stating a gene is complete or partial according to the gene predictor

eggnog_functional_categories.desc: eggNOG functional category(ies) of the annotated eggNOG(s)
